channel.title: Blizzard Dump
channel.description:
I am looking into dumping the content from previous blizzard games (warcraft III, starcraft etc etc)
I was wondering where exactly is the media stored on the computer/cd and has anyone ever tinkered with these things?
I came across this website : http://www.spriters-resource.com/pc_computer/starcraft/index.html However, it is not what I need.
If anyone has any free time, help me google.

item.title: Blizzard Dump
